Class ByteUDPServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • byteremote.server.udp.ByteUDPServer

    ByteServer

    public class ByteUDPServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ByteServer
    This class implements server side for UDP Connections

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Stop the UDP server thread. Note: After stopping the server, it cannot be started again.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface ByteServer
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - In case of error

      • setDataTimeOut

        public void setDataTimeOut(int timeOut)
        Set timeout for waiting a data packet. By default the timeout is 1000ms and it can be changed in order to fit better in a poor/good connection.
        Parameters:
        timeOut - wanted timeout
